text: I'm Pedro I'm a software Network
developer at AWS and I've been working
here for two years and a half now I work
as a software engineer and we provide
solutions for monitoring the network
someone that's trying to go through the
hiring process I would suggest to first
of all learn more about Amazon
especially about the hiring process like
what is expected from you understand
like the Amazon leadership principles
and be prepared for the interview for to
be asked questions about their past
experiences and also on the technical
side learn the basics and how to apply
them on real life the hiring process for
me started in Brazil and then I had my
final interviews at Buenos Aires in
Argentina and then I was hired and then
I came to Dublin within a couple of
months
the most exciting part for me of my job
here in Amazon is that we are facing
challenges every day and get a chance to
work with really amazing Technologies
and with really amazing teammates like
talented people that I didn't ever get
the chance to work with before
most importantly is the fact that like
the product that we develop is
positively affecting impacting
people around the world
what I love most about Dublin is the
fact that Dublin is a big city but it's
also a small City in a way that like you
have everything you need close by and
it's not like a crowded City like other
capitals and so yeah originally I'm from
my small city in Brazil and being here
Dublin fills me in some way living at
